scenario_text.value: Why... Why would Saki try to kill me?
Does she hate me that much...?

Pull yourself together, Aoi! That was just an
illusion of Saki, nothing more!
Oh... Yes, yes, that makes sense.
Saki would never side with the enemy.

(Aoi still seems out of it. There’s no way
I can take her with me like this...)

Labramon, you rest here with Aoi for
a while, okay?

In the meantime, I’ll go look for the others
with Agumon.

You got it. I won’t let her out of my sight.
Not a chance.
Take care of the others, okay?
It was my fault. It was all my fault...

(I’m worried about Aoi, but...at least
Labramon is looking after her.)
